mapper.select: select id, unique_code, product_code, tenant_code, parent_code, resource_code, resource_name, path, type, resource_type, order_num, description, expand1, expand2, expand3, expand4, expand5, is_delete, created_by, updated_by, created_time, updated_time from o2o_support_idaas.app_product_resource where id = #{id}

select id, unique_code, product_code, tenant_code, parent_code, resource_code, resource_name, path, type, resource_type, order_num, description, expand1, expand2, expand3, expand4, expand5, is_delete, created_by, updated_by, created_time, updated_time from o2o_support_idaas.app_product_resource limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into o2o_support_idaas.app_product_resource(unique_code, product_code, tenant_code, parent_code, resource_code, resource_name, path, type, resource_type, order_num, description, expand1, expand2, expand3, expand4, expand5,status,platform ,is_delete, created_by, updated_by, created_time, updated_time) values (#{uniqueCode}, #{productCode}, #{tenantCode}, #{parentCode}, #{resourceCode}, #{resourceName}, #{path}, #{type}, #{resourceType}, #{orderNum}, #{description}, #{expand1}, #{expand2}, #{expand3}, #{expand4}, #{expand5},#{status},#{platform}, #{isDelete}, #{createdBy}, #{updatedBy}, #{createdTime}, #{updatedTime})

insert into o2o_support_idaas.app_product_resource(unique_code, product_code, tenant_code, parent_code, resource_code, resource_name, path, type, resource_type, order_num, description, expand1, expand2, expand3, expand4, expand5,status,platform, is_delete, created_by, updated_by, created_time, updated_time) values
(#{entity.uniqueCode}, #{entity.productCode}, #{entity.tenantCode}, #{entity.parentCode}, #{entity.resourceCode}, #{entity.resourceName}, #{entity.path}, #{entity.type}, #{entity.resourceType}, #{entity.orderNum}, #{entity.description}, #{entity.expand1}, #{entity.expand2}, #{entity.expand3}, #{entity.expand4}, #{entity.expand5},#{entity.status},#{entity.platform}, #{entity.isDelete}, #{entity.createdBy}, #{entity.updatedBy}, #{entity.createdTime}, #{entity.updatedTime})

insert into o2o_support_idaas.app_product_resource(unique_code, product_code, tenant_code, parent_code, resource_code, resource_name, path, type, resource_type, order_num, description, expand1, expand2, expand3, expand4, expand5, is_delete,status,platform, created_by, updated_by, created_time, updated_time) values
(#{entity.uniqueCode}, #{entity.productCode}, #{entity.tenantCode}, #{entity.parentCode}, #{entity.resourceCode}, #{entity.resourceName}, #{entity.path}, #{entity.type}, #{entity.resourceType}, #{entity.orderNum}, #{entity.description}, #{entity.expand1}, #{entity.expand2}, #{entity.expand3}, #{entity.expand4}, #{entity.expand5}, #{entity.isDelete},#{entity.status},#{entity.platform},#{entity.createdBy}, #{entity.updatedBy}, #{entity.createdTime}, #{entity.updatedTime})
on duplicate key update product_code = values(product_code) , tenant_code = values(tenant_code) , resource_code = values(resource_code)
mapper.update:
update o2o_support_idaas.app_product_resource
unique_code = #{uniqueCode},
product_code = #{productCode},
tenant_code = #{tenantCode},
parent_code = #{parentCode},
resource_code = #{resourceCode},
resource_name = #{resourceName},
path = #{path},
type = #{type},
resource_type = #{resourceType},
order_num = #{orderNum},
description = #{description},
expand1 = #{expand1},
expand2 = #{expand2},
expand3 = #{expand3},
expand4 = #{expand4},
expand5 = #{expand5},
is_delete = #{isDelete},
created_by = #{createdBy},
updated_by = #{updatedBy},
created_time = #{createdTime},
updated_time = #{updatedTime},
where id = #{id}
